website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a well-made compact washer, this is a good choice. Magic Chef has been making quality appliances for generations, and this model exemplifies that.
pros: A sturdy, compact model that is ideal for small living spaces such as RVs, campers, and apartments
Has a compact capacity capable of washing a regular load
cons: It won't work for large loads and isn't ideal for consumers with lots of laundry to do

customer_reviews.title: Item defective
customer_reviews.text: The washing machine arrived with a crack in the outlet pipe. Leaked a tub of water on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: O. Hewes

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate buy one
customer_reviews.text: I received this portable washer today and it works really good it holds a good amount of cloths it’s even washers a large size blanket I used to have a different model magic chef I guess they Discontinued it because I can’t find it anymore but it lasted me like 11 years I hope this one will last just as long
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Old House Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful little machine. It recommends powder soap so you are aware. It works with HE liquid if you are careful of quantity. Very nice and easy install and packaged well. Time will tell if it holds up. The size is Great for small areas, amd especially Old houses with very narrow and steep staircases.
customer_reviews.author: Kd

customer_reviews.title: I’m not going to the laundromat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my apartment and it gets the job down. I cant hook the hose up to the faucet (it’s tough and it causes leaks for me when I do get it hooked up) so I just fill up manually with a bucket. I put enough water to cover the clothes, turn it on and go mind my business. I did have to start taping the outlet hose to the sink it was emptying in. It just wouldn’t stay as is. I have small complains but using this still beats the hell out of having to go to the laundromat. I get my clothes done and push this thing into a closet when I’m done.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jackson

customer_reviews.title: When you select hot water wash it mixes hot and cold so really hot selection is luke warm.
customer_reviews.text: Working good for 4 months now in my rv. Has hot and cold inlet.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This works far better than any full-size washer I have had. Clothes get super clean and have less water to dry out. It is easy to move even going up a few steps I can grab and lift. I bought it after seeing a friend's YouTube review. The size is great- I would not go smaller. I can get a queen sheet set just in or four days of clothing (small not winter clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Floridayogi

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: A decent washer if you limit your loads to a smaller level. Also must be leveled or cheap sheet metal on sides will EASIILY dent. In my opinion it is too much money for the results, however, so far it has worked rather well as described. I needed a washer right away as my 20 year old stacking unit definitely was heading to happier hunting grounds, but still a little more research might have derived a better value.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Dean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent washer. It works so quietly that I cannot hear it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It’s amazing how this machine can wash with such little bit of water.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Luke

customer_reviews.title: FAST DELIVERY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my portal washer!!! Truly does the job and is very powerful when it spins. I've even notice some of my clothes look brighter than than when I use the washer at the laundry mat. Pretty quiet if you are not trying for your neighbors to know you have a washer in apt./ house lol. Other than that, it is very efficient. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: LiZ & Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Magic chef washer!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything the washer runs like a dream and holds a heck of load while doing it!!! If you are thinking about purchasing anything magic chef ront hesitate just do it
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Bookwalter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for RV / Camper / LQ Horse Trailer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for RV/Camper. Arrived with a small dent, does not affect performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one or two people.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Clothes are as dry as if I used an extractor.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas White

customer_reviews.title: No noice
customer_reviews.text: I love this washer machine small and wash very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good investment.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a single, 20 something, lady. I live in a second story apartment. This came early with minimal cosmetic damage. It was easy to assemble and fits on all of my sinks. It cleans a weeks worth of work clothes or undies/pjs/socks really well. I've have no noise complaints. When I'm done it fits well into a spare closet. I bought it to make my life easier amid Covid, and I recommend it to everyone :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley O

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this washer
customer_reviews.text: Very good washer. Does a perfect job. Great for small apartments
customer_reviews.author: sirat

customer_reviews.title: Best washer ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I made in years. Due to COVID 19 I decided it was time to buy a washer. I live in NYC and space Is non existent in my apartment. It washes just as good as a laundry mat. Very quiet machine. I forget it’s even on sometimes. I bought the dolly so I can move it when I need to. It holds the same amount as the medium size machine in the laundry mat. I’ve had it for a month now and I have done over 20 loads so I already got my money’s worth. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great little workhorse.
customer_reviews.text: Have had for 2 weeks. Hooked up to regular washer hookup next to my dryer. Very efficient and gets clothes clean. I leave it set for large load so it gets enough water. I use normal wash mode. No leaks. Works great. Hold 3 pairs of jeans and 3 shirts plus underclothes.
customer_reviews.author: Patti West-Truby

product_meta.title: 1.6 Cu. Ft. Compact Top-Load Washer in White
product_meta.description: For small loads and limited space, the Magic Chef compact top-load washer is a game changer. Equipped with a variety of convenience features, it includes a see-through window, electronic controls with LED display, stainless steel inner tub, detergent dispenser and two water inlets. Boasting the same durable construction of larger models, our portable washer makes any laundry day a breeze by delivering full-size results. Perfect for anywhere you need to save space, it makes a great compact choice for apartments and vacation homes.
feature_bullets: Easily accessible control panel provides convenient access to wash options
6 fully automatic wash cycles provide optimal care for a variety of fabrics
Rollers make it easy to move the washer
3 water level & 3 temperature settings ensure clothes are washed properly
Pulsator generates strong & weak water flows for an even wash
Auto shutoff after the cycle end signal for added convenience

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars30 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
